mapper.insert: insert into vueblog.m_blog(id, user_id, title, description, content, created, status, link) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{content}, #{created}, #{status}, #{link})
mapper.select: select count(*) from vueblog.m_blog where DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y') = #{year} group by DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y');
select mb.id, username, title, description, content, mb.created, mb.status from vueblog.m_blog mb left join vueblog.m_user mu on mb.user_id = mu.id order by created desc ;

select mb.id, username, title, description, content, mb.created, mb.status from vueblog.m_blog mb left join vueblog.m_user mu on mb.user_id = mu.id where title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') order by created desc;
select count(*) from vueblog.m_blog where created > #{ldt}
select count(*) from vueblog.m_blog where #{ldt} > created and YEAR(created) = #{year};
